title: Wonderful, warm and classy boutique hotel
text:
I've stayed two or three times at the Pelham and it's my hotel of choice for London. The staff has been kind and considerate and my rooms have always been lovely. Last time there, I sat in the lounge and was about to order a glass of wine when the wait staff remembered I liked rose...and brought it on her own. Nice touch.
I was offered an upgrade when I arrived as well, as the room was not quite ready when I checked in... very kind indeed. A beautiful room, well appointed and luxurious.
Thank you Pelham... you are tops on this American girl's list! :-)
Room Tip: Prefer higher floor. See more room tips
